channel.title: Please LOOK! Need help wit Command!
channel.description:
if(command.startsWith("corp") && playerRights > 0) { toX = 2834; toY = 3278; resetfollowers(); }
thats what i added for corp but how come only staff can tele there? i put playerights to 0? Please help.

item.title: Please LOOK! Need help wit Command!
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Yeah you did but i had already typed it up when BAM you post yours first so i figure what the hey and just post it too

Read full topic
item.source: Please LOOK! Need help wit Command!

item.title: Please LOOK! Need help wit Command!

@deathschaos9 wrote:

@ytuio9
I could of sworn I just told him that.

item.source: Please LOOK! Need help wit Command!

item.title: Please LOOK! Need help wit Command!
item.dc:creator: @Rocky2k10 Rocky2k10
item.description:
@Rocky2k10 wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:5, topic:361587”][quote author=Rocky2k10 link=topic=457858.msg3350601#msg3350601 date=1285278303]

[quote]if(command.startsWith(“corp”) && playerRights > 0) {
toX = 2834;
toY = 3278;
resetfollowers();
}[/quote]

thats what i added for corp but how come only staff can tele there? i put playerights to 0?

Please help.
[/quote]

That’s because you said

playerRights > 0)

If you remember your Kindergarten maths, you should know that > stands for “bigger than”, < stands for “smaller than”, and = is (duh) “equals”.

This means that you said “PlayerRights Bigger Than 0”, which means a moderator, administrator or the server owner.
Normally you would remove the playerRights statement or replace the ">’’ with “>=” which means Bigger Than or equal to.

I hope i helped :)[/quote]

omg i actually didnt even look at that part thanks for telling me i will know next time

Read full topic
item.source: Please LOOK! Need help wit Command!

item.title: Please LOOK! Need help wit Command!
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Rocky2k10, post:1, topic:361587”][quote]if(command.startsWith(“corp”) && playerRights > 0) {
toX = 2834;
toY = 3278;
resetfollowers();
}[/quote]

thats what i added for corp but how come only staff can tele there? i put playerights to 0?

Please help.[/quote]

That’s because you said

playerRights > 0)

If you remember your Kindergarten maths, you should know that > stands for “bigger than”, < stands for “smaller than”, and = is (duh) “equals”.

This means that you said “PlayerRights Bigger Than 0”, which means a moderator, administrator or the server owner.
Normally you would remove the playerRights statement or replace the ">’’ with “>=” which means Bigger Than or equal to.

I hope i helped

Read full topic
